We request approval to give the fallen Drummer Lee Rigby a state funeral.

Drummer Lee Rigby is a British soldier who joined the service to protect his family and this Great Nation.

Please show your respect by signing and joining our cause and signing this petition which in 2 days has acquired nearly 100,000 signatures on a social media site.

Rigby was killed in a brutal attack in London's Woolwich neighbourhood on Wednesday, May 22, 2013. The 25-year-old soldier from Manchester was part of the 2nd Batallion The Royal Regiment of Fusiliers. He is leaving behind a 2-year-old son, Jack.
